Reviews.Title: “Good for the price!”
Reviews.Author: Elaine S
Reviews.Content: expect 2star hotel clean staff friendly breakfast minimal fresh cant beat price youre looking fancy yes bathroom tiny serves purpose pool clean cold didnt view hottub stay trouble getting extra towels requested stay

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for families with children”

Reviews.Content: stayed days inn night visiting childrens museum tight budget trip little concerned caliber hotels price range particularly traveling children ages 6 chose hotel reviews despite price range pleased quality found hotel shopping dining options nearby staff friendly hotel updating terms carpeting decor nicely furnished size pool clean free breakfast offer typical dry cereal coffee offer variety including belgian waffles fruit pastries etc price paid hotel expected doesnt offer scenic views deluxe amenities youre looking stop night thats clean safe acceptable sleeping low price option
